Posts.Title: Biopsied yesterday, just playing the waiting game too! Kat197 chrissyb

Posts.Content: Kat197 wrote: Hi all. I'm Kathy! I'm 40 years old and just had my first mammogram two weeks ago. I had found a lump in my breast about a month ago, so decided I better get it checked out. I was sent for the mammogram and ultrasound by my nurse practioner, where it was confirmed that it was indeed a lump. lol But since the radiologist couldn't tell me if it was a cyst or not, he recommended a biopsy. The doctor who saw my results, also recommended the biopsy. So I said "Ok" and had the biopsy yesterday. I was very scared to go through that procedure, but I did it. All by myself. :) My husband had to work, so I decided I could do it on my own.Â  Now the waiting game starts. I can phone to the clinic to get my results tomorrow, or wait until Tuesday when i see the doctor. I'm thinking I'm going to call tomorrow! They took 4 samples of tissue. It was a hard lump, no liquid. I guess that doesn't mean anything at this point, except that it's not a cyst? Thank you to all who post here. I don't feel so alone anymore. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsied yesterday, just playing the waiting game too! Kat197 chrissyb
